trans-unit.source: Defines points of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance about which a tracking service should be notified.
trans-unit.target: Define os pontos de interesse no caminho potenciais execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz sobre os quais um serviço de controlo deve ser notificado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] During its run time, a workflow instance emits tracking events to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Durante o tempo de execução, uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de controlo para o tempo de execução a infraestrutura de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses a TrackingProfile to filter these tracking events and returns tracking records based on this filtering to a tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução utiliza um TrackingProfile para filtrar estes eventos de controlo e devolve os registos de rastreio com base nesta filtragem para um serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: There are three kinds of tracking events that can be filtered: activity status events, workflow status events, and user events.
trans-unit.target: Existem três tipos de eventos que podem ser filtrados de controlo: eventos de estado de atividade, eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho e os eventos de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific activity status events; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific workflow status events; and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> objects to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A> property to match specific user events.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>objetos para a propriedade <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>para corresponder aos eventos de estado de atividade específica; <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>objetos para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A>propriedade para corresponder aos eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho específico; e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>objetos para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>propriedade para corresponder aos eventos de utilizador específico.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: When a track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure returns the data associated with the tracking event to the tracking service over the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with that service.
trans-unit.target: Quando é correspondido um ponto de registo, a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução devolve os dados associados com o evento de controlo para o serviço de controlo sobre o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>associados a esse serviço.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: The data is returned in either an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>, or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> depending on the type of track point that was matched.
trans-unit.target: Os dados, são devolvidos num <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>, ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>dependendo do tipo de ponto de controlar que foi correspondido.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service implements the methods in the abstract <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> class to provide the functionality for the runtime tracking infrastructure to request a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> associated with the service, and a TrackingProfile associated with a particular workflow instance or with a particular workflow type.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de controlo de implementa os métodos de abstrato <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>classe para fornecer a funcionalidade para o tempo de execução controlo infraestrutura para pedir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>associados ao serviço e um TrackingProfile associados com instâncias de fluxo de trabalho específica ou com um tipo de fluxo de trabalho específica.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service must also implement the abstract <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> class to provide the channel over which the runtime tracking infrastructure can send tracking records.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço de controlo também tem de implementar o abstrato <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>classe para fornecer o canal através do qual o tempo de execução controlo infraestrutura pode enviar registos de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>

trans-unit.source: When the tracking service returns a tracking profile object to the runtime, the workflow starts to execute, and the tracking profile is serialized.
trans-unit.target: Quando o serviço de controlo devolve um perfil de controlo de objeto para o tempo de execução, o fluxo de trabalho é iniciado executar e o perfil de controlo está a ser serializado.

trans-unit.source: If the serialization of the tracking profile fails, an exception is raised to the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Se falhar a serialização do perfil de controlo, uma exceção é desencadeada para a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: If the exception is not handled, the workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Se a exceção não é processada, a instância de fluxo de trabalho é terminada.

trans-unit.source: The tracking profile can be validated before passing it to the runtime using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O perfil de controlo pode ser validado antes de passou-a para o tempo de execução utilizando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A TrackingProfile can be serialized to XML by using the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>, which formats the XML according to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um TrackingProfile pode ser serializado para XML utilizando o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>que formata o XML de acordo com o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer.Schema%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer>

trans-unit.source: This provides a convenient format for profile storage and for authoring a profile in a non-programmatic manner.
trans-unit.target: Esta opção fornece um formato prático para armazenamento de perfil e para a criação de um perfil de forma não programática.

trans-unit.source: For example, the SQL Tracking Service stores serialized versions of its tracking profiles, as will any tracking service you create based on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> class.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os arquivos de serviço de controlo SQL serializado versões do respetivos perfis de controlo, tal como será qualquer serviço de controlo que cria com base na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> vazio

trans-unit.source: You can add track points to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar pontos de controlar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A>para configurar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.ActivityTrackPoints%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of activity track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter activity status events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos de controlar atividade utilizado pela infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para eventos de estado de atividade de filtro.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits activity status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> of an activity instance changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de estado de atividade para a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução sempre que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>um alterações de instância de atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the ActivityTrackPoints property to filter these activity status events to determine when to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de runtime de controlo utiliza a propriedade ActivityTrackPoints para filtrar estes eventos de estado de atividade para determinar quando deve enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> to the ActivityTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want the runtime infrastructure to send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>para a propriedade ActivityTrackPoints para especificar pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potenciais da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual pretende que a infraestrutura de runtime para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match an activity status event for which it should send an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>realmente não definir um ponto de físico de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas em vez disso, define um conjunto de parâmetros de correspondência de que podem ser utilizados pelo runtime infraestrutura para corresponder a um evento de estado de atividade para o qual este deve enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> de controlo</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido demasiadas vezes durante o tempo de vida de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>também pode especificar a dados a ser extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho e devolvida <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send an <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPointCollection"> </xref> que especifica os pontos de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para que a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução deve enviar um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord"> </xref> para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of user track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter user events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos de controlar de utilizador utilizada pela infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para eventos de filtro do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: A workflow designer or an activity designer can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to instrument a workflow or an activity to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure at specific points during the execution of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o estruturador de fluxo de trabalho ou um designer de atividade <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para instrumentar um fluxo de trabalho ou uma atividade para emitir dados para o controlo infraestrutura em pontos específicos durante a execução de um fluxo de trabalho de runtime.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Such an occurrence is called a user event and the data emitted is called user data.
trans-unit.target: Uma ocorrência de tal é chamada um evento de utilizador e os dados emitidos denomina-se os dados de utilizador.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the UserTrackPoints property to filter user events to determine when to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de runtime de controlo utiliza a propriedade UserTrackPoints para filtrar eventos de utilizador para determinar quando deve enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to the UserTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> sent.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>para a propriedade UserTrackPoints para especificar pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potenciais da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual pretende um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>enviado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines a set of match parameters that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match user events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>não define na realidade, um ponto de físico numa instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas em vez disso, define um conjunto de parâmetros de correspondência de que pode ser utilizado pela infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para corresponder aos eventos de utilizador.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido demasiadas vezes durante o tempo de vida de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure always returns the user data associated with a matched <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, but a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> can also specify data to be extracted from the workflow instance and returned in the tracking record.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução sempre devolve os dados de utilizador associados a um correspondentes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>, mas um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>também pode especificar dados a ser extraído da instância de fluxo de trabalho e devolvido no registo de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPointCollection"> </xref> que especifica os pontos de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para que a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução deve enviar um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord"> </xref> para o serviço de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a versão do perfil de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Because of the semantics of profile caching in the workflow runtime engine, if you change the contents of a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> you must update Version.
trans-unit.target: Devido a semântica de perfil a colocação em cache no motor de runtime de fluxo de trabalho, se alterar os conteúdos de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>tem de atualizar versão.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: If you do not, your updated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> may not be loaded by the workflow runtime engine, even if it is returned by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or sent in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se não o fizer, o atualizado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>não pode ser carregado pelo motor de runtime de fluxo de trabalho, mesmo que será devolvido por uma chamada para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou enviados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>associados a um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>eventos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.TryReloadProfile%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to ensure that the updated <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is loaded by the workflow runtime engine, you should change the Version for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, para se certificar de que a atualização <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>é carregada pelo motor de runtime de fluxo de trabalho, deve alterar a versão de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: You can then explicitly call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on any appropriate workflow instances, or, depending on your implementation, you can rely on the tracking service to inform the workflow runtime engine of the change.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, pode chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>quaisquer instâncias de fluxo de trabalho adequada, ou, dependendo da sua implementação, também pode utilizar o serviço de controlo para informar o motor de runtime do fluxo de trabalho da alteração.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.ReloadTrackingProfiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Version> of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of workflow track points used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to filter workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de pontos de controlar de fluxo de trabalho utilizada pela infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução para filtrar eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance emits workflow status events to the runtime tracking infrastructure whenever a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> occurs indicating that the status of a workflow instance has changed.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho emite eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho para a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução sempre que um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>ocorre com a indicação de que o estado de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho foi alterada.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses the WorkflowTrackPoints property to filter these workflow status events to determine when to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A infraestrutura de runtime de controlo utiliza a propriedade WorkflowTrackPoints para filtrar estes eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho para determinar quando deve enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>para o serviço de controlo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> to the WorkflowTrackPoints property to specify points of interest in the potential execution path of the workflow instance for which you want a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> sent.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>para a propriedade WorkflowTrackPoints para especificar pontos de interesse no caminho de execução potenciais da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual pretende um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>enviado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> does not actually define a physical point in a workflow instance, but instead defines one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that can be used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match workflow status events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>não define na realidade, um ponto de físico numa instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas em vez disso, define um ou mais <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>valores que podem ser utilizados pelo controlo a infraestrutura de runtime para corresponder aos eventos de estado do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the same <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can be matched many times during the lifespan of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o mesmo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>pode ser correspondido demasiadas vezes durante o tempo de vida de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> can also specify any annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>também pode especificar qualquer anotações devem ser devolvidos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPointCollection"></xref> that specifies the points in a workflow instance for which the runtime tracking infrastructure should send a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"></xref> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPointCollection"> </xref> que especifica os pontos de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para que a infraestrutura de controlo do tempo de execução deve enviar um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord"> </xref> para o serviço de controlo.
